summary: Ryunosuke awakens in the forest having no more idea what happened that previous night, as he'd been drunk & hallucinatory. He is surrounded by corpses & can surmise it's his own handiwork.
cast: Raizô Ichikawa|Kôjirô Hongô|Tamao Nakamura|Fujiko Yamamoto|Yutaka Nakamura|Akihiko Katayama|Reiko Fujiwara|Tokiko Mita|Mieko Kondô
title: Daibosatsu toge: Ryujin no maki
